::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe jumps to the left, shots hitting his right arm. He growls.

"Puny Maximal. Now you shall feel my power!" he says in his whisper.

"Cloak."

With that command, DeathScythe's cloaking device kicks in, the bot seemingly 
disapearing. He takes a step back, grinning evily. Taking out a pistol, he 
fires it at Hot Rod.
